name: godbound
description: CSS compiler for the Godbound system

scripts.build: sass src/scss/godbound.scss css/godbound.css --style=expanded --no-source-map && rm -rf ./_build/ && mkdir -p ./_build/godbound && cp -a ./css ./assets ./lang ./module ./templates ./LICENSE ./README.md ./system.json ./template.json ./_build/godbound/ && cp -a system.json _build/ && cd _build && zip -r ./godbound.zip ./godbound && cd .. && rm -rf ./_build/godbound
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run load
scripts.release: git fetch && git checkout main && npm run build && gh release create

author: Asacolips
